description:
I love viewer participation!

Elijah is a broke college student who had seen Spence's pictures on the website. He sent us an e-mail saying how much he wanted to do a film with Spence. He had attached a few pictures of himself and what I really liked was his thick, curly, blond hair. So, I gave him a call and he seemed really nice and put together.

One of my favorite things is to put a gay guy with a straight guy and see how it plays out. When the two of them first met, I asked Elijah to tell Spence what he liked about him. Now, Spence is a very modest guy and it's difficult for him to receive compliments. It was really cute to see him blush as Elijah told him how hot he is. I think Spence really liked Elijah too, as he made comments about his "soft lips" and "nice hair".

Once they got started... well, I don't think I've ever seen a bottom have as much fun as Elijah had riding Spence's cock!
title: Spence & Elijah
